Class OpenWeatherMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.aksingh.java.api.owm.OpenWeatherMap

  • public class OpenWeatherMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to get weather, forecast, and other data from OpenWeatherMap.org

    2.5.0.1
    Version:
    2013/08/05
    Author:
